subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Michael Bradley and Clint Dempsey scored first-half goals eight minutes apart and Brian Ching added a goal early in the second half as the United States defeated Trinidad and Tobago, 3-0, in a regional World Cup qualifier in Bridgeview, Ill., on Wednesday night. The United States has won all three games in the semifinal round in the Concacaf region. The American team, with Tim Howard in goal, had also shut out Guatemala and Cuba.
